info.title: Thesaurus Terms API - Decision Types
info.description: API for retrieving terms related to different types of decisions on LMOs (Living Modified Organisms) for introduction into the environment.

get.description: Retrieve terms associated with decision types for LMOs, including descriptions in multiple languages.

200.description: A list of terms related to decision types on LMOs, such as 'Decision on LMOs for intentional introduction into the environment.'

example.name: Decision on LMOs for intentional introduction into the environment (according to Article 10 or domestic regulatory framework)
